overview: Between fiction and documentary, “The Jokester”, better known as Marc-André Avon, is at a crossroads when his work in the drug-trade with his best friend Manuel Gingras turns salty. When Manuel's shenanigans start to jeopardize his family life, Marc-André turns to his lifelong passion in the hopes to start a new career: stand up comedy. Camped in a redneck region of Quebec, the jokester is torn at the idea of losing his greatest friend in order to reconnect with his family.
title: Le P'tit Comique
